Primary.description: Reflects the text.primary variable from the theme object

Secondary.description: Reflects the text.secondary variable from the theme object

Disabled.description: Reflects the text.disabled variable from the theme object

Main.description: Reflects the Primary/Main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the primary.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the primary.light variable from the theme object

Main.description: Reflects the secondary.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

Darker.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

Lightest.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

onSecondary.description: Reflects the secondary.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

Main.description: Reflects the error.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the error.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the error.light variable from the theme object

Contrast.description: Reflects the error.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

4p.description: Used for hover states. The token represents 4% of the Error/Main token

12p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 12% of the Error/Main token

30p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 30% of the Error/Main token

50p.description: Used for enabled state. The token represents 50% of the Error/Main token

160p.description: Used for Alert content. The token represents 60% #000 on top of the Error/Main token

190p.description: Used for Alert background. The token represents 90% #FFF on top of the Error/Main token

Main.description: Reflects the warning.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the warning.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the warning.light variable from the theme object

Contrast.description: Reflects the warning.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

4p.description: Used for hover states. The token represents 4% of the Warning/Main token

12p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 12% of the Warning/Main token

30p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 30% of the Warning/Main token

50p.description: Used for enabled state. The token represents 50% of the Warning/Main token

160p.description: Used for Alert content. The token represents 60% #000 on top of the Error/Main token

190p.description: Used for Alert background. The token represents 90% #FFF on top of the Error/Main token

Main.description: Reflects the info.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the info.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the info.light variable from the theme object

Contrast.description: Reflects the info.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

4p.description: Used for hover states. The token represents 4% of the Warning/Main token

12p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 12% of the Info/Main token

30p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 30% of the Warning/Main token

50p.description: Used for enabled state. The token represents 50% of the Warning/Main token

160p.description: Used for Alert content. The token represents 60% #000 on top of the Info/Main token

190p.description: Used for Alert background. The token represents 90% #FFF on top of the Info/Main token

Main.description: Reflects the success.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the success.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the success.light variable from the theme object

Contrast.description: Reflects the success.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

8p.description: Used for hover states. The token represents 4% of the Success/Main token

12p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 12% of the Success/Main token

30p.description: Used for focus visible states. The token represents 30% of the Success/Main token

50p.description: Used for enabled state. The token represents 50% of the Success/Main token

160p.description: Used for Alert content. The token represents 60% #000 on top of the Info/Main token

190p.description: Used for Alert background. The token represents 90% #FFF on top of the Info/Main token

Paper.description: Reflects the background.paper variable from the theme object

Default.description: Reflects the background.default variable from the theme object

Divider.description: Reflects the divider variable from the theme object

Outlined Border (23p).description: Border style for outlined variant components in resting state (Text Field, Select, Chips, etc)

Filled Input Background.description: Token for the background style for the Filled variant components (Text Field, Select, Multiline).

Standard Input Line.description: Token for the underline style for the Standard variant components (Text Field, Select, Multiline).

Rating Active.description: Active state color for Rating component

focus-ring-color.description: Reflects the default user agent color
